name: SAPlanet Amigurumi Pattern - Value Set B (4 Patterns Pack)
description: This listing is for pdf crochet pattern of 4 amigurumi patterns namely: 1. TorGri Tortoise 2. Bluko Penguin 3. Rebbie Crab 4. Forestie Tortoise You get savings of $2 for this listing! To enjoy the savings, you must purchase the value listing as it is packed for. You may read about each character in their individual listing. RESTRICTION Finished Doll – Selling of finished doll is allowed; Pattern – DO NOT redistribute, resell, and/or translate pattern into another language for reselling. Regret that action will be taken against those who infringe this clause. AFTER TRANSACTION SERVICE For any assistance you may need pertaining to the crochet pattern, please feel free to contact me on my email (in the pdf file), I normally respond within a day. Even for the simplest question that you may think not worth asking, I urge you to pop that question too, I sincerely want to help you sail through the project. Every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy and completeness of the pattern, however typo error may sometimes still occur. Be assured that any correct required to be made to the pattern will be made known to you via email once the error is detected. COMPLETELY NEW TO CROCHET Buyers who are completely new to crochet and unfamiliar with the basics, please indicate Basics when you check out, I will include a separate file (Free) which include steps for basic crochet stitches illustrations. *BONUS: A simple grannny square pattern is created for new learner, in aim to help new learner to practice and familiarise with working the hook with yarn. This is a complimentary copy, you don’t pay a cent for it! SHIPPING No shipping fee is required as the file will be sent to your email as soon as payment is received. (within a day) Please ensure that your email address is provide to me when checking out. Thank you for looking.
